name: forkflash
description: ForkFlash is a smart, fun, and fast recipe companion app. Search and save recipes for offline use, manage grocery lists, and cook hands-free with an AI-powered voice assistantâ€”all built with Laravel and Flutter in a clean & organized setup.

scripts.backend:migrate: cd backend && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec app php artisan migrate
scripts.backend:seed: cd backend && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec app php artisan db:seed
scripts.backend:fresh: cd backend && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec app php artisan migrate:fresh --seed
scripts.backend:test: cd backend && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec app vendor/bin/pest
scripts.backend:test:unit: cd backend && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec app vendor/bin/pest --testsuite=Unit
scripts.backend:test:feature: cd backend && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec app vendor/bin/pest --testsuite=Feature
scripts.backend:test:coverage: cd backend && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec app vendor/bin/pest --coverage
scripts.backend:format: cd backend && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec app vendor/bin/pint --config=pint.json
scripts.backend:format-check: cd backend && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec app vendor/bin/pint --config=pint.json --test
scripts.backend:analyse: cd backend && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec app vendor/bin/phpstan analyse --configuration=phpstan.neon
scripts.backend:refactor: cd backend && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec app vendor/bin/rector process --config=rector.php
scripts.backend:refactor-dry: cd backend && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec app vendor/bin/rector process --config=rector.php --dry-run
scripts.backend:check-all: npm run backend:format-check && npm run backend:analyse && npm run backend:test
scripts.backend:fix-all: npm run backend:refactor && npm run backend:format && npm run backend:analyse && npm run backend:test
scripts.backend:serve: cd backend && php -d memory_limit=1G artisan serve
